Html:
Hi,
Background: I'm trying to use RAWR to discover if respeccing and regemming to match particular cast sequences will increase my DPS.  Specifically, I'd like to know if my mage, with stacked up crit, would do well with the cast sequence of Scorching until Hot Streak is active, then Instant Pyroblast, then back to Scorching.  (No fireballs, so I removed all fireball related talents from my tree).

Is there a way to use the Custom Spell Mix to create a sequence which is dependent on proc rates, such as the case of Hot Streak (or Kill Command etc)?

Also could you tell me, under my character stats, it says:
Solution :: DPS :: 2400
FBPyro :: 1937
Under Talents Analysis it says my Custom Spec is: 2180

How can I grab spell rotation as related to DPS, for my gear level and spec?

Thanks!

For Scorch-Pyro on HS I'd have to add the cycle, you can't implement dynamic cycles as custom mix. I'm not sure what you're referring to with talents analysis. There are two charts titled Talent Specs, use the custom one (the one at the bottom), the other one is not accurate for mage model.
